function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of ventilation and open spaces in multi-family residential buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease spread within the building","Mitigation":"Implementing ventilation systems, creating open green spaces, and integrating connecting structures between buildings","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, green infrastructure, prefab connecting structures","People":"Residents of multi-family residential buildings","Owner":"Building developers and managers"},{"Description":"Limited space for remote work and social activities","Impact":"Potential negative impact on mental, social, and physical health of residents","Mitigation":"Creating adequate living and working spaces as well as complementary content-engaging environments for leisure and social activities","Technologies":"Space optimization techniques, modular furniture, digital communication platforms","People":"Residents of multi-family residential buildings","Owner":"Building developers and managers"},{"Description":"Lower attractiveness of multi-apartment buildings compared to single-family buildings","Impact":"Decreased preference for multi-family buildings leading to occupancy challenges","Mitigation":"Improving functional comfort and quality of living environment in multi-family buildings","Technologies":"Smart home technologies, energy-efficient design, green building materials","People":"Potential residents and building developers","Owner":"Building developers and managers"}]}
